abstract: Despite the intense scrutiny over pay, Judge Robert Owen ruled Commerzbank, which bought Dresdner and was later bailed out by the German government, must honor its contractual obligations.
snippet: Despite the intense scrutiny over pay, Judge Robert Owen ruled Commerzbank, which bought Dresdner and was later bailed out by the German government, must honor its contractual obligations.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — In the battle over banker bonuses, score one for the bankers.

headline.main: Former Dresdner Bankers Win Court Battle Over Unpaid Bonuses
